ad.title: Auxiliaire Parentale/ Garde d'enfant
ad.content:
Hi, I'm Joey Gil, a 34 year old dedicated child care provider from the Philippines with over 5 years of experience working with children of ages between 0-13. A graduate of Bachelor of Science in Hotel and Restaurant Management who is passionate for nurturing and guiding young minds where in I can make a positive impact on children's lives. I have been living in Paris for almost 6 years while working professionally as a childcarer, can speak English fluently with an A2 level in French, punctual, patient, reliable, trustworthy and values honesty.
Experience(Professional and non-professional):
- 2022-2024 French-Moroccan family(0 to 3 years old)
- 2020-2021, French family; (1 and 3 years old) 2021, French family(3 years old)
- 2018 to 2022, Part-time housekeeping with different french families
- 2020, French family(5 years old)
- 2018-2019, French family (4, 9, and 13 years old)
- 2018- Present, Doing occasional babysits
- I came from a big family of 6 siblings which I took a part in taking care of my nieces/nephews.
Skills:
- Certified in CPR and First Aid, ensuring a safe environment for children.
- Strong communication skills, allowing effective collaboration with parents and children.
- Highly organized and reliable, with a keen attention to detail.
- Basic cooking
- Proven ability to manage daily routines, including meal preparation, activities, and bedtime schedules.
- Able to closely follow instructions, strictly adhere to safety and hygiene standard and can work with minimal supervision
INTERESTS:
- Travel and outdoor exploration
- Culture, Music and Arts
- Health and Fitness
- Child psychology
I am committed to provide a nurturing, safe, and enriching environment for your children to thrive. I am looking forward to the opportunity to work with your family and contribute positively to your child's growth and development.
*Can provide verifiable and solid references if needed
PS SEARCHING FOR A FULL-TIME JOB or SEMI-FULL TIME
Thank you!
